### Welcome!

I am Samdani Ansar and I am a PostDoctoral Fellow student in the [Strucural Bioinformatics & Cheinformatics](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/bonnet) group of [Prof. Dr. Pascal Bonnet](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/bonnet/equipe) at the [Institut de Chimie Organique et Analytique](https://www.icoa.fr/) (ICOA). I work under the supervision of [Samia ACI-SÈCHE](https://www.icoa.fr/fr/content/samia-aci-s%C3%A8che) on Computational PROTAC modelling.

I did my Ph.D. in Bioinformatics from SASTRA Deemed to be University, India under [DBT-JRF fellowship](https://www.dbtjrf.gov.in/). I have also qualified and ranked 8th in the [DBT-BINC](https://dbtindia.gov.in/schemes-programmes/building-capacities/national-fellowships/bioinformatics-national-certification) exam.
